00011 #include <float.h>

00013 namespace mlpack {
00014 namespace math  {
00015 
00023 inline double ClampNonNegative(double d)
00024 {
00025   return (d + fabs(d)) / 2;
00026 }
00027 
00035 inline double ClampNonPositive(double d)
00036 {
00037   return (d - fabs(d)) / 2;
00038 }
00039 
00048 inline double ClampRange(double value, double rangeMin, double rangeMax)
00049 {
00050   value -= rangeMax;
00051   value = ClampNonPositive (value) + rangeMax;
00052   value -= rangeMin;
00053   value = ClampNonNegative (value) + rangeMin;
00054   return value;
00055 }
00056 
00057 }; // namespace math
00058 }; // namespace mlpack
